title: Yuletide

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything, they gain an Ice Mark, and you learn their name.
- Whenever a player with an Ice Mark visits another non-Everfrost player or is visited by another non-Everfrost player, that player gains an Ice Mark and you learn their name.
- At least one other Everfrost role that uses Ice Marks will always spawn as long as this one does.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player each night. They gain an Ice Mark if they don't have one and are roleblocked if they do.
